title: British pound set for biggest rising streak in more than three decades
text:
British pound set for biggest rising streak in more than three decades

Stock Markets 22 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 11:09)

LONDON (Reuters) - The British pound jumped more than a percent against the dollar on Thursday after Britain clinched a Brexit deal with the European Union. Sterling has gained six percent against the dollar over the last six trading sessions , its biggest rising streak since October 1985, according to Refinitiv data.

British pound set for biggest rising streak in more than three decades
description: British pound set for biggest rising streak in more than three decades
